meanings.definition: The quality of forming a united whole.
meanings.sent1: The team's cohesiveness was evident in their seamless collaboration.
meanings.sent2: The cohesiveness of the puzzle pieces made it easy to complete.
meanings.sent3: The cohesiveness of the ingredients in the recipe ensured a delicious outcome.
meanings.sent4: The cohesiveness of the group was like a tightly woven fabric, strong and unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The cohesiveness of the colors in the painting created a harmonious masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The state of sticking together firmly.
meanings.sent1: The cohesiveness of the glue kept the broken pieces of the vase together.
meanings.sent2: The cohesiveness of the tape made sure the poster stayed on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The cohesiveness of the bandage held the cut closed securely.
meanings.sent4: The cohesiveness of the magnet kept the metal objects attached.
meanings.sent5: The cohesiveness of the velcro fastener made it easy to open and close.
